transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Main call se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Main bol raha tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To hamara jo website hai.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: To bol raha tha ki promote hamara jo website hai na company ka.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo bol raha tha ki promote karenge ya hoga.
Customer: To uske kya update hai matlab.
Executive: Kaise promote hoga sir aisa hota hai dekho aap jitna use karoge main batau aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap jaisa use karoge jaisa aapka consumption pattern rahega us tarike se aapka listing visibility banega.
Executive: Aur promote wali baat sir aise kuch promote nahi hota hai all over India ka aap baithe ho all over India.
Customer: Main kar na wo mujhe bola tha ki aapka jo bhi hum matlab IndiaMART se promote karte hai aapka website bhi.
Customer: Wo aisa karke bola tha lekin mujhe.
Executive: Promote matlab dekho agar customer aapke pass aa raha hai chal ke to sir promote hi ho raha hai na ek tarike se aapka company customer ko dikh raha hai tabhi to wo aa raha hai aapke pass.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aise koi particular promotion nahi hai matlab particular promotion nahi hota hai aise wo to aapke sir consumption pattern pe aap jitna lead consume karoge utna aapka listing visibility banega online market mein to customer utna aapko dekh payega ye logic hota hai ha.
Executive: Theek hai aur sir baki koi aur issue hai kya?
Customer: Nahi matlab wahi hai thoda sa wo kam lead kal bhi ek bhi nahi aaya to wahi hum check kar rahe hain login karke abhi check kar rahe hain lead nahi aaya leads.
Executive: Lead kahan wo thoda relevant issue hai na thoda nahi aa rahe abhi.
Executive: Calls to aa rahe hai sir samne se calls wagera pe kya response hai?
Customer: Call call sab thoda kam hai call ka utna bhi nahi aa raha hai matlab.
Executive: Sir abhi aapko ek call nahi hai na one lead mein ek bhi call aaya call but jaise bola gaya tha ki matlab channel mein jaise ki call bahut aa sake.
Customer: Yahan par call nahi aa raha hai kyu mujhe pata nahi bahut hi kam call aa raha hai.
Executive: Aisa dekho sir ab to wahi hai ki abhi ek mahina hua hai abhi listing visibility banegi sir abhi naye ho aap.
Customer: Kafi ho gaya na matlab.
Executive: Abhi naye ho aap sir IndiaMART pe hai na nahi to sir calls utne se aayenge jaise aap lead consume karoge waise calls aayenge jaise jyada aap activity rakhoge IndiaMART pe waise calls aayenge sir dheere dheere aayenge abhi itni jaldi nahi ho sakta kuch ek mahine mein aur sir dusri baat ye hai ki abhi dekho sir ek minute pehle ek lead aaya hua hai West Bengal ka IP.
Customer: Haan check kar rahe hai uska wo check kar rahe hai check kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ye lead dekho na try karke ek minute ek minute pehle aaya hua hai shayad conversion ho jaye aapka dusri cheez hai ki sir aapke pass mera personal number bhi to hai.
Customer: Ek bar mujhe hi mara tha udhar se theek hai main save karta hun.
Executive: Sir aap mera personal number save kar lo na sir abhi ke abhi phone mein.
Customer: Batao.
Executive: 7610

Customer: 7610
Executive: 28
Customer: 28
Executive: 16
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 61
Customer: 1661 ha.
Executive: Aap na isko na Nayanshi ke naam se save kar lo kyuki sir aap na 9696 pe bhi call karoge na to bhi main hi aapka phone uthaungi isse type se better aur kabhi kabhi kya hota hai record line pe call karte ho to kabhi kabhi na main phone nahi utha paun ya pata nahi chalta sir kahan se call aa raha hai kya call aa raha hai hai na aap mere ko personal number pe call karoge to mere ko jaldi identify hoga ki aapka call aa raha hai.
Customer: Main aapko kiya abhi theek hai ek dusra number se main theek hai.
Executive: Haan ab mere ko usi number pe call kiya karo.
Executive: Aur baki aap mujhe ye aur batao ki inquiry wagera bhi to aa rahi hai aapke pass samne se.
Customer: Kam aa raha hai madam wahi hum baithe hai dekhte hai kya inquiry aati hai ye wala aaye hum dekhte hai baat karke kya bolte hai theek hai.
Executive: Matlab ye to sir buylead ho gaya inquiry to alag hota hai na lead manager pe jo samne se message karte hai wo inquiry hota hai.
Customer: To matlab jo wo kahan se matlab lead manager se kaise karna hai kya aisa bol rahe ho ek bar lead manager mein check karo kuch customer ne na aapko message kiya hua hai samne se.
Customer: Haan jo ki wo to matlab wo kal tak jo last hai wo humne baat kiya hai aapko sir ha aapko sir November mein by lead chhod kar ke main kuch conversion matlab wo kahan se kar sakta hun matlab by lead man ke nahi aaya.
Customer: Haan wo kahan se khatam kar fir.
Executive: Jaise buylead ho gaya ek to sir aapka mode of business theek hai dusra hota hai sir inquiry inquiry lead manager mein samne se customer aapko message karta hai wahi main aapko bol rahi hun abhi November mein aapko 12 inquiry aayi hai matlab samne se jaise customer ne search kiya aapka IT solution IT solution service provider in West Bengal to aapka company usko dikh gaya waha pe do option aate hai call now aur inquiry now agar wo call now pe click nahi kar raha to inquiry pe click kar deta hai to aapke pass message aa jata hai lead manager mein jaise whatsapp pe message aata hai na koi message karta hai to same to waha check karo aap lead manager mein bhi kuch logo ne aapko message kiye hai unpe bhi call karo ek to ho gaya buylead jinhe hume contact by now karke call karna hi karna hai ek hota hai inquiry jo samne se customer message kiya hai unpe bhi call karna aur third to sir aapko pata hi hai samne se calls aate hai.
Executive: Aur teen mode hote hai sir hai na aur baki jo abhi aapke product addition wagera to sab ho hi gaya hai proper apna.
Customer: Abhi to kuch nahi hai filhal filhal jo jo product tha wahi hai abhi wo kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi kuch nahi hai na ha theek hai aur theek hai aur baki sir ek cheez aur main yahan pe dekh rahi thi ek minute.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir ek minute thoda slow hai sir CCTV installation service mein apne aur product hai kya?
Customer: CCTV ka?
Executive: CCTV installation service mein aur product hai apne apne pass?
Customer: Wahi hai na CCTV wahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir baki use karo aur abhi wo ek minute wali lead kar lo baat baat kar lo customer se lead manager bhi check karo.
Customer: Haan theek hai haan haan bilkul theek hai.
Executive: Aur sir aapne na ha aapne na 9696 pe call kiya hai to yahan pe fir concern raise ho jata hai to main close kar di hun na aisa koi particular concern to hai nahi aapka theek hai sir okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads are not being generated.

- Customer says calls are very less.



Resolution:

- Explained how listing visibility works.

- Executive shared her personal number.

- Explained about lead manager and inquiry process.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check lead manager for inquiries.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, listing visibility, lead manager, inquiry
